comments_since_last_sample.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.

Any time you have a pool of data collected, you become a target .. I can't imagine any bigger target to gain information  then a site like that ..  I'm not saying the purpose for the site is  nefarious or any thing like that .. just if I wanted to gain active emails for predator practices I'd go after a site that has willful  large masses of individual willingly letting me know their email address are active and go from there..

 cyber security is a double edge sword ..  it is correct that 2fa is a better solution  that should be a standard and requirements anytime you need to provide personal data.
This is a legitimate site and is one of the many feeds used by information security professionals.
How can i be sure it won’t leak my email id to spam
